heading: Is the EU doing enough to ensure an equitable ecological transition across the European Union?
subheading: 88% of European citizens believe that it is a priority for the green transition to leave no one behind. 50% think that the EU is taking adequate action.
tooltip1: perceive the measures towards the green transition as fair
textNote: 26.395 EU citizens were interviewed from 30.05.2022 to 28.06.2022
